concept.title: What is Subtraction?
concept.shortdesc: This topic introduces the concept of subtraction.

conbody.p: The subtraction operation gives the difference between two numbers. Subtraction is denoted by the minus '-' sign. It is the opposite of addition.
This process is mostly used to find how many are left when some things are taken away.

ul.li: The subtraction of two positive numbers can result in either a positive or a negative number
The subtraction of two negative numbers can result in either a positive or a negative number
